data.name: Hero_MainSlogan
data.value: More than software – a buddy for life.

data.name: Hero_Subtitle
data.value: Spinner.Net is your personal AI companion who understands you, protects your time, and helps you live the life you want.

data.name: Pillar_Spinnen_Description
data.value: Here ideas, projects and social innovations emerge. Creative spaces and workshops for art, environment, technology and education.

data.name: Pillar_Vermitteln_Description
data.value: Courses and workshops for all ages. Mentorships between generations. Languages, culture and practical learning.

data.name: Pillar_Marktplatz_Description
data.value: Flexible work models and community-oriented projects. Implementation of the 23% rule for solidarity financing.

data.name: About_Vision_Text
data.value: The Spinnerei is more than a place – it's a model for living together, working, learning and spiritual growth. At the center is the human being in their wholeness – not just as an employee, but as a feeling, thinking and creative being.

data.name: About_Mission_Text
data.value: We create space, time and trust so that people can unfold, realize ideas and shape community. A place for all generations, cultures and life situations – carried by the idea: Who carries today, will be carried tomorrow.

data.name: Support_23Percent_Description
data.value: The number 23 stands symbolically for voluntary and responsible participation in a community. The more people act, the more people can be carried. It's not about control, but about trust – the central capital of the Spinnerei.

data.name: Support_BGE_Description
data.value: People carried by basic income have no obligations. They receive time and space to find themselves again. Who was carried, later carries others. A chain of trust.

data.name: Beta_Description
data.value: Get early access to our digital platform. Create AI buddies, manage tasks, and connect with the community.

data.name: Beta_Hero_Subtitle
data.value: Become a Beta Tester of the Future

data.name: Beta_Hero_Description
data.value: Get exclusive access to our platform and help us perfect the Bamberger Spinnerei.

data.name: Beta_Benefits_Subtitle
data.value: Discover the advantages of the Beta Program

data.name: Contact_Description
data.value: Have questions or want to get involved? We'd love to hear from you.

data.name: Index_Hero_Slogan
data.value: We create space, time and trust

data.name: Index_Hero_Description
data.value: Where machines once rattled, life should emerge again: through ideas, encounters and collaborative action.

data.name: Index_Vision_Description
data.value: A society in which individual potential is promoted, social responsibility is lived and collective intelligence is used.

data.name: Index_Vision_RoomForAll_Description
data.value: The Spinnerei is a place for all generations, cultures and life situations – carried by the idea: Who carries today, will be carried tomorrow.

data.name: Index_Vision_Digital_Description
data.value: This analog space is complemented by Spinner.Net as a technological platform – accessible to all, regardless of location or technical experience.

data.name: Index_Pillars_Description
data.value: The Spinnerei is based on three interconnected pillars that complement each other in content and support each other structurally.

data.name: Index_Pillars_Spinnen_Description
data.value: This is where ideas emerge – from craft to social to digital and international projects. The Spinnerei offers space, materials, networking and support.

data.name: Index_Pillars_Vermitteln_Description
data.value: Knowledge is not taught here, it is shared. In an atmosphere of trust, workshops, courses and inspiring encounters emerge between people from different walks of life.

data.name: Index_Pillars_Marktplatz_Description
data.value: A place where work is rethought – self-determined, versatile and people-friendly. Here people work freely, but not alone.

data.name: Vision_Description
data.value: The vision of Bamberger Spinnerei: A society in which individual potential is promoted, social responsibility is lived and collective intelligence is used. Discover the 23% principle and the BGE.

data.name: Vision_Hero_Description
data.value: A society in which individual potential is promoted, social responsibility is lived and collective intelligence is used.

data.name: Vision_Foundation_Description
data.value: The Spinnerei creates space, time and trust so that people can unfold, realize ideas and shape community.

data.name: Vision_Foundation_Human_Description
data.value: At the center is the human being in their wholeness – not just as employee, consumer or performer, but as a feeling, thinking and creative being.

data.name: Vision_Foundation_Together_Title
data.value: Who carries today, will be carried tomorrow

data.name: Vision_Foundation_Together_Description
data.value: A place for all generations, cultures and life situations – carried by the idea of mutual carrying and being carried.

data.name: Vision_Principle_Description
data.value: The economic foundation of the Spinnerei is based on a simple but effective principle of solidarity financing.

data.name: Vision_Principle_How_Description
data.value: Anyone who earns income through the Spinnerei – whether through courses, projects, services or sales – contributes 23% of this income to the common Spinnerei fund. The remaining 77% remains freely available for personal use.

data.name: Vision_Principle_Uses_Description
data.value: The fund finances maintenance of spaces, technical infrastructure like Spinner.Net, new projects and seed funding, the BGE, as well as continuing education and public relations.

data.name: Vision_Principle_Symbol_Description
data.value: The number 23 stands symbolically for voluntary and responsible participation in a community where everyone contributes so that others can grow. It's not about control, but about trust – the central capital of the Spinnerei.

data.name: Vision_BGE_Description
data.value: An unconditional basic income funded from the common pool that enables people a safe space for orientation and creative development.

data.name: Vision_BGE_How_Description
data.value: Initially, Peter Paul Clinton will support one person from his own income. Once this person generates income through their own projects, the BGE share decreases – and the next person can be supported.

data.name: Vision_BGE_Chain_Description
data.value: This principle creates a chain of trust: Those who were carried, later carry others. The BGE is not a one-way street, but a dynamic cycle.

data.name: Vision_BGE_Freedom_Description
data.value: People carried by the BGE have no obligations in the initial phase. They receive time and space to find themselves again and develop new life perspectives.

data.name: Vision_BGE_Growth_Description
data.value: Only over time – when the desire for participation comes from within – do ideas for own projects or engagement emerge. Spinner.Net accompanies this path gently.

data.name: Vision_International_Description
data.value: The Spinnerei thinks beyond Bamberg – as a model that can also work in other regions and countries.

data.name: Vision_International_Global_Description
data.value: Spinnereien in different countries could emerge – networked via Spinner.Net, but with their own cultural character.

data.name: Vision_International_Exchange_Description
data.value: Educational exchange, youth encounters and international internships open new perspectives for all participants.

data.name: Vision_International_Projects_Description
data.value: Example projects like the training center for tourism workers in Sri Lanka show the global potential of the concept.

data.name: Vision_CTA_Description
data.value: The Spinnerei lives from encounter, trust and co-creation. Everyone is invited – whether curious, skeptical, enthusiastic or simply searching.

data.name: Vision_CTA_Placeholder_Description
data.value: Here could be an inspiring image of the community

data.name: Spinnen_Description
data.value: This is where ideas emerge – from craft to social to digital and international projects. The Spinnerei offers space, materials, networking and support for your creative endeavors.

data.name: Spinnen_Hero_Description
data.value: From craft to social to digital and international projects. The Spinnerei offers space, materials, networking and support.

data.name: Spinnen_Space_Description
data.value: Whether a child designs a new playground equipment, an entrepreneur develops a commercial platform, or a young person creates an app: The Spinnerei provides the framework.

data.name: Spinnen_Space_Room_Description
data.value: Physical and digital spaces for creative development, equipped with the necessary tools and technologies.

data.name: Spinnen_Space_Material_Description
data.value: From prototyping tools to digital platforms – everything needed to turn ideas into reality.

data.name: Spinnen_Space_Network_Description
data.value: Connection to mentors, partners and other creatives who can support implementation.

data.name: Spinnen_Education_Description
data.value: A special focus is on children and young people, because they are our future. Here new forms of education, social work and mental health emerge.

data.name: Spinnen_Education_Holistic_Description
data.value: How can children discover their talents, develop emotional strength and grow self-determined? Beyond performance pressure and outdated curricula.

data.name: Spinnen_Education_Skills_Description
data.value: Socially important topics are tested in small, protected groups and developed together.

data.name: Spinnen_Projects_Description
data.value: From local initiatives to international visions – the Spinnerei is a living ecosystem with space for small and large endeavors.

data.name: Spinnen_International_Description
data.value: Large-scale visions find space here – projects that are locally anchored and can unfold global impact.

data.name: Spinnen_International_SriLanka_Description
data.value: Building a training center for tourism workers in Sri Lanka that qualifies young people for work in Germany. From May to October they work in the German high season, in winter they return to Sri Lanka, where high season is then.

data.name: Spinnen_International_SriLanka_Benefits_Description
data.value: This creates a mutual flow of knowledge and experience that promotes long-term economic stability and intercultural competence. People are holistically accompanied – in thinking, acting and living together.

data.name: Spinnen_International_Model_Description
data.value: The combination of training, cultural exchange and digital infrastructure creates a model that is transferable to many regions worldwide.

data.name: Spinnen_Integration_Description
data.value: The Spinnerei is a place of encounter for people of all cultures and backgrounds.

data.name: Spinnen_CTA_Description
data.value: Do you have an idea that needs space, materials or networking? The Spinnerei supports you in turning vision into reality.

data.name: Spinnen_CTA_Placeholder_Description
data.value: Here could be an image of creative work

data.name: Footer_Mission
data.value: We create space, time and trust so that people can unfold, realize ideas and shape community.

data.name: Footer_Subtitle
data.value: Spin your idea. We give you time.

data.name: Index_Features_Title
data.value: More than software – a new way of being together

data.name: Index_Features_Description
data.value: We create space for your ideas. Three pillars support our community: Spinning, Teaching, and the Marketplace.

data.name: Index_Features_Zeitsparkasse_Description
data.value: Whether you're trying out a new learning concept, developing an app, or having a vision for sustainable tourism – here you'll find space, materials, and people to accompany you.

data.name: Index_Features_Innovation_Description
data.value: Knowledge isn't lectured here, it's shared. From experienced craftsmen to young entrepreneurs – everyone passes on what they can. No grade pressure, with real encounters.

data.name: Index_Features_Community_Description
data.value: Work self-determined, but not alone. Here you can program and paint, teach in the morning and make music in the evening. Your identity can be multidimensional.

data.name: Index_HowItWorks_Description
data.value: Three simple steps to your innovation and community participation

data.name: Index_HowItWorks_Step1_Description
data.value: Create your personal profile, define your skills and interests. Choose whether you want to give or receive time.

data.name: Index_HowItWorks_Step2_Description
data.value: Find suitable projects, teams or mentors. Use our AI-powered matching technology for optimal connections.

data.name: Index_HowItWorks_Step3_Description
data.value: Trade time for time, collect ZeitCoins and build your network. Together we create more.

data.name: Index_Stories_Description
data.value: Real people, real results - how Bamberger Spinnerei changes lives

data.name: Index_Stories_Maria_Quote
data.value: "Through the Time Bank I was able to trade 200 hours of programming for marketing expertise. My startup is now successfully funded!"

data.name: Index_Stories_Hans_Quote
data.value: "As a retired engineer, I pass on my knowledge while learning digital skills. The community keeps me young!"

data.name: Index_CTA_Description
data.value: Become part of a community that understands time as the most valuable resource. Start your journey in Bamberger Spinnerei today.

data.name: Index_News_Description
data.value: Stay updated on the latest developments

data.name: Index_News_ZeitCoin_Description
data.value: The new version of our time currency is live! Improved security, new features and better user experience.

data.name: Index_News_Labs_Description
data.value: Our expanded facilities now offer space for 100+ innovators. State-of-the-art equipment included.

data.name: Index_News_AI_Description
data.value: Peter Paul Clinton discusses the future of work in the AI era. Recording now available.

data.name: Index_Newsletter_Description
data.value: Receive weekly updates on new features, events and community highlights.

data.name: Spinnen_Education_Future_Description
data.value: Socially important topics are tested in small, protected groups and developed together.

data.name: Vision_Pillars_Description
data.value: Discover the three core areas where people can contribute, learn, and grow together.

data.name: Vision_Pillars_Spinnen_Description
data.value: Space for creative development, education, and innovative projects that grow from the community.

data.name: Vision_Pillars_Vermitteln_Description
data.value: Connecting people, sharing knowledge, and building bridges between different communities and experiences.

data.name: Vision_Pillars_Marktplatz_Description
data.value: A marketplace for meaningful work, sustainable projects, and economic activities that serve the community.

data.name: Vermitteln_Description
data.value: Connecting people, sharing knowledge, and building bridges between different communities and experiences.

data.name: Vermitteln_Hero_Subtitle
data.value: Building bridges between communities, experiences, and generations.

data.name: Vermitteln_Hero_Description
data.value: Everyone has unique knowledge and experiences to share. We create spaces where people can learn from each other and grow together.

data.name: Vermitteln_Knowledge_Description
data.value: We believe that sharing knowledge creates connections and opens new possibilities for everyone.

data.name: Vermitteln_Knowledge_Experience_Description
data.value: Every person carries valuable life experiences that can inspire and guide others on their journey.

data.name: Vermitteln_Knowledge_Skills_Description
data.value: From crafts to technology, from cooking to communication - skills shared strengthen the entire community.

data.name: Vermitteln_Knowledge_Network_Description
data.value: Connecting the right people at the right time can create wonderful opportunities and collaborations.

data.name: Vermitteln_Mentoring_Description
data.value: Experienced community members support others in their personal and professional development.

data.name: Vermitteln_Mentoring_Personal_Description
data.value: Support in finding your own path, developing self-confidence, and discovering personal strengths.

data.name: Vermitteln_Mentoring_Professional_Description
data.value: Guidance in career development, skill building, and professional networking within meaningful work contexts.

data.name: Vermitteln_Events_Description
data.value: Regular events bring people together to learn, share, and build lasting connections.

data.name: Vermitteln_Events_Workshops_Description
data.value: Practical workshops where community members teach each other useful skills and crafts.

data.name: Vermitteln_Events_Talks_Description
data.value: Inspiring talks where people share their journeys, insights, and life lessons with the community.

data.name: Vermitteln_Events_Networking_Description
data.value: Informal gatherings designed to help people meet, connect, and discover collaboration opportunities.

data.name: Vermitteln_CTA_Description
data.value: Whether you want to share your knowledge or learn from others, there's a place for you in our community of connectors and learners.

data.name: Vermitteln_CTA_Placeholder_Description
data.value: What you know can help others grow

data.name: Marktplatz_Description
data.value: A marketplace for meaningful work, sustainable projects, and economic activities that serve the community.

data.name: Marktplatz_Hero_Subtitle
data.value: Creating economic opportunities that serve people and planet.

data.name: Marktplatz_Hero_Description
data.value: Work should be more than just earning money. We create spaces for meaningful projects, fair collaboration, and economic models that benefit everyone.

data.name: Marktplatz_Work_Description
data.value: Work that creates value for people, communities, and the environment - not just profit.

data.name: Marktplatz_Work_Purpose_Description
data.value: Every project should contribute to something meaningful and create positive impact in the world.

data.name: Marktplatz_Work_Community_Description
data.value: Work that strengthens communities and brings people together rather than isolating them.

data.name: Marktplatz_Work_Balance_Description
data.value: Flexible working arrangements that respect personal time, family, and well-being.

data.name: Marktplatz_Services_Description
data.value: A platform where community members can offer their skills and find the services they need.

data.name: Marktplatz_Services_Creative_Description
data.value: Artists, designers, writers, and creative professionals offering their talents to meaningful projects.

data.name: Marktplatz_Services_Technical_Description
data.value: Developers, engineers, and technical experts supporting community projects and social enterprises.

data.name: Marktplatz_Projects_Description
data.value: Join forces with others to create projects that make a real difference in the world.

data.name: Marktplatz_Projects_Social_Description
data.value: Projects that address social challenges and improve quality of life for communities.

data.name: Marktplatz_Projects_Sustainable_Description
data.value: Environmentally conscious projects that promote sustainability and regenerative practices.

data.name: Marktplatz_Projects_Innovation_Description
data.value: Experimental projects exploring new technologies and methodologies for positive change.

data.name: Marktplatz_Economy_Description
data.value: Exploring fair and sustainable ways to organize economic activity within our community.

data.name: Marktplatz_Economy_TimeBank_Description
data.value: A system where time becomes currency - one hour of anyone's work equals one hour of someone else's work.

data.name: Marktplatz_Economy_TimeBank_How_Description
data.value: Members earn time credits by helping others and can spend these credits to receive help in return. It values all contributions equally.

data.name: Marktplatz_Economy_Cooperative_Description
data.value: Businesses owned and democratically controlled by their workers, ensuring fair wages and shared decision-making.

data.name: Marktplatz_Economy_Cooperative_Benefits_Description
data.value: More equitable income distribution, job security, and alignment between worker interests and business success.

data.name: Marktplatz_CTA_Description
data.value: Whether you're looking for meaningful projects or want to start your own sustainable venture, our community is here to support you.

data.name: Marktplatz_CTA_Placeholder_Description
data.value: Create value for people and planet

data.name: Impressum_Subtitle
data.value: Legal information according to the German Telemediengesetz

data.name: Impressum_TechnicalDescription
data.value: Development and operation of the Spinner.Net platform

data.name: Impressum_ContentLiabilityText
data.value: As a service provider, we are responsible for our own content on these pages according to general laws in accordance with Section 7 (1) of the German Telemediengesetz (TMG). However, according to Sections 8 to 10 TMG, we as a service provider are not obligated to monitor transmitted or stored third-party information or to investigate circumstances that indicate illegal activity.

data.name: Impressum_LinkLiabilityText
data.value: Our website contains links to external third-party websites over whose content we have no influence. Therefore, we cannot assume any liability for this external content. The respective provider or operator of the pages is always responsible for the content of the linked pages.

data.name: Impressum_CopyrightText
data.value: The content and works created by the site operators on these pages are subject to German copyright law. Duplication, processing, distribution and any kind of exploitation outside the limits of copyright require the written consent of the respective author or creator.

data.name: Impressum_OnlineDisputeText1
data.value: The European Commission provides a platform for online dispute resolution (ODR):

data.name: Impressum_OnlineDisputeText2
data.value: We are neither willing nor obligated to participate in dispute resolution procedures before a consumer arbitration board.

data.name: Impressum_CommunityText1
data.value: Bamberger Spinnerei is more than just a platform - we are a community.

data.name: Impressum_CommunityText2
data.value: We create space, time and trust so that people can develop ideas, realize them and shape community.

data.name: Impressum_CommunityMottoText
data.value: You are not alone - together we are stronger than any system.

data.name: Impressum_PrivacyDescription
data.value: Learn more about how we handle your personal data.

data.name: Impressum_TermsDescription
data.value: The rules and conditions for using our platform.

data.name: Impressum_ContactDescription
data.value: Do you have questions? We are here for you and are happy to help.

data.value: How would you like to sign in?

data.name: Interview_UseQuestion
data.value: What will you mainly use Spinner.Net for?

data.value: Everything is ready for you. Welcome to Spinner.Net!

data.name: Dashboard_Action_Time_Desc
data.value: Manage your time contributions and exchanges within the community.

data.name: Dashboard_Action_Community_Desc
data.value: Join conversations and collaborate with fellow community members.

data.name: Dashboard_Recent_Welcome_Desc
data.value: You've successfully joined our community. Your journey begins now!
